name: Joe The Moonhead
description:
Joe the Moonhead is an intricate logic arcade that leaves Earth itself behind, taking you to the farthest reaches of space. What Joe wants is what we all want at one level or another: push our limits, not accept what is imposed on us and go as far as we can. Simply because we can. It's a fully crafted game with a retro, handcrafted aesthetic, reminiscent of the simple magic of the early years of cinema, with references to George Méliès classics like A Trip to the Moon.A logic challenge in the solitude of space, challenging stars and facing the biggest boss in the universe. Well, the biggest boss REALLY.

#arcade #retro #altgame
